parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the loss of power steering assist, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering warning light illuminates
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
the steering wheel becomes difficult or impossible to turn
the vehicle pulls to one side while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering gear motor bolts can cause the loss of power steering assist, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering warning light illuminates
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
the steering wheel becomes difficult or impossible to turn
the bolts holding the steering motor corrode and fall out of the rack and pinion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal assembly can cause the brake pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to stop the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal sticks to the floor
the vehicle fails to stop as needed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the suspension components can cause the loss of vehicle control, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle loses control
the front-right lower control arm breaks
the front-right suspension is damaged
the right-rear suspension is damaged.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake vacuum pump can cause the vehicle to hesitate to respond to braking, leading to increased stopping distances and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the vehicle hesitates to respond to braking
the brake assist warning light is illuminated
the brake pedal barely moves when pressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake sensors can cause the vehicle's brakes to become inoperable, leading to increased stopping distances and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the vehicle's brakes fail to stop the vehicle when the brake pedal is depressed
the brake assist and check engine warning lights are illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate HID Headlight Illumination and Premature Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Insufficient headlight illumination can increase the risk of accidents, especially at night, and premature failure can lead to sudden loss of visibility, compromising vehicle safety.
symptoms: Inadequate illumination
difficulty seeing pedestrians or obstacles
HID headlights fail prematurely
warning messages indicating headlight failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear differential can cause the vehicle to lose power and mobility, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle's rear differential makes a howling or roaring noise
the vehicle's rear differential completely stops functioning
the vehicle is unable to move or is barely rolling
no warning lights or indicators are present.
